DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia Ambulatory male ( 40 75 year , inclusive ) female ( 45 75 year , inclusive ) subject Calculated LDLC level great equal 100 mg/dL ( 2.5 mmol/L ) triglycerides less 500 mg/dL ( 5.65 mmol/L ) usual stable lipidlowering therapy Breast feeding lactate woman Previous organ transplantation Highgrade stenosis ( > 75 % ) occlusion segment either carotid artery History carotid endarterectomy , insertion carotid artery stent schedule either procedure
